title: Creamy winter leek and potato soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter, or more if needed', '2 leeks, cleaned and chopped', '80g chopped onion', '6 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '950ml chicken stock', '230ml pouring cream', '110g grated Cheddar cheese (optional)', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
